name: @progress/jsdo
description: The JSDO is a JavaScript implementation of the CDO Specification published by Progress Software Corporation. The JSDO is a free and open-source full-featured implementation that can be used in web, mobile web and hybrid mobile apps.

scripts.build:jsdo: mkdirp build && concat -o build/progress.jsdo.js scripts/MobileClientApacheLicense.txt src/progress.util.js src/progress.js src/progress.session.js src/auth/progress.auth.js src/auth/progress.auth.basic.js src/auth/progress.auth.bearer.js src/auth/progress.auth.form.js src/auth/progress.auth.sso.js
scripts.build:jsdo-core: npm run build:jsdo && ncp packages/core build/packages/jsdo-core && mkdirp build/packages/jsdo-core/lib && ncp build/progress.jsdo.js build/packages/jsdo-core/lib/progress.core.js && mkdirp build/packages/jsdo-core/typings && ncp typings/progress.all.d.ts build/packages/jsdo-core/typings/progress.core.d.ts && ncp LICENSE build/packages/jsdo-core/LICENSE
scripts.pack:jsdo-core: npm run build:jsdo-core && cd build/packages && npm pack ./jsdo-core
scripts.test:tc-smokes: npm run build:jsdo && mocha test/smoke*.js --recursive --reporter mocha-teamcity-reporter

author: Progress Software
